attributes.action: Support an International inquiry into the start of the 2019/20 virus pandemic.
attributes.additional_details:
Commercial pressure is being put on countries who want the Chinese Government to be transparent about this disaster. Australia is under enormous pressure. The EU has been put under pressure. We need all free countries to stand together in support of the truth.

Our country has lost so much. Our Government owes it to us to do all in its power to find out why, and to make sure we are not exposed like this again.
attributes.background:
Persuade  the Chinese Government it is their duty to enable people to know exactly what happened so that it never happens again. 
So many people have died unnecessarily

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the United Kingdom has become party to a World Health Organisation resolution calling for an impartial, independent and comprehensive evaluation to review experience gained and lessons learned from the WHO-coordinated international health response to COVID-19: https://apps.who.int/gb/ebwha/pdf_files/WHA73/A73_CONF1Rev1-en.pdf

We have also published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Debate the Chinese government’s handling of Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311905
